likes.fullText:
react-three/csg goes into a minor. the shapes that you can build by nesting operations are available for anything that wants to use them come useEffect. this creates some nice interop, pair it with react-three/rapier for instance and you have physics.

https://t.co/APu5UfByIO https://t.co/bRfz7agTzz
